column3: 2015. angelina santella homemaker mrs. angelina santella
column8: mrs. santella came to the united states at 13 years of age. she was a longtime resident of springfield before moving to fair acres geriatric center in media in 2005. she was a member of st. kevin church. she enjoyed cooking
column10: and gardening. she was devoted to her family and enjoyed family gatherings. she is survived by a son
column16: pa and marie flannigan of avalon
column20: and 5 great-great-grandchildren. she was predeceased by her husband of 69 years
column22: in 1996. relatives and friends are invited to her viewing on saturday
column24: 2015 from 10:00 to 11:00 am at st. kevin church
column27: pa 19064 followed immediately by her funeral mass. interment will be at ss peter & paul cemetery
column29: pa. donations in her memory may be made to her longtime favorite charity
column34: pa 19106. condolences. frances durr. such a wonderful great lady. my and fran's condolences. our prayers and thoughts are with the family. leave condolence. fromemail (optional)message
